name: Eviction Appeal
description: Form to appeal an eviction judgment or order

sections.title: NOTICE OF APPEAL - EVICTION JUDGMENT
NOTICE OF APPEAL
sections.content: NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that {tenant_name}, Defendant in the above-entitled action, appeals to the appropriate appellate court from the judgment of eviction entered on {judgment_date} in the above-entitled action.

sections.title: 1. APPELLANT INFORMATION
2. DESCRIPTION OF JUDGMENT
sections.content:
On {judgment_date}, the court entered the following judgment or order:

{original_court_action}

sections.title: 3. GROUNDS FOR APPEAL
sections.content:
This appeal is based on the following grounds:

{grounds_for_appeal}

sections.title: 4. HARDSHIP STATEMENT
sections.content:
The eviction will cause the following hardship to the appellant and/or appellant's family:

{hardship_explanation}

sections.title: 5. SUPPORTING EVIDENCE
sections.content:
This appeal is supported by the following evidence:

{supporting_evidence}

sections.title: 6. REQUEST FOR STAY OF EXECUTION
sections.content:
Appellant hereby requests a stay of execution of the judgment pending appeal based on the following:

{stay_request}

sections.title: 7. FEE WAIVER REQUEST
sections.content:
Appellant requests a waiver of the filing fee for this appeal based on the following circumstances:

{fee_waiver_request}

sections.title: 8. CERTIFICATION
sections.content:
I certify that this appeal is being filed within the deadline for filing an appeal, which is {filing_deadline}.

I further certify that a copy of this Notice of Appeal has been served on all parties to this action.

sections.title: 9. SIGNATURE
sections.content:
Dated: {current_date}

________________________
{tenant_name}, Appellant

________________________
{attorney_name}, Attorney for Appellant (if applicable)
